member.name: T:Pilz.Configuration.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: Eine stark typisierte Ressourcenklasse zum Suchen von lokalisierten Zeichenfolgen usw.

member.name: P:Pilz.Configuration.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Gibt die zwischengespeicherte ResourceManager-Instanz zurück, die von dieser Klasse verwendet wird.

member.name: P:Pilz.Configuration.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Überschreibt die CurrentUICulture-Eigenschaft des aktuellen Threads für alle Ressourcenzuordnungen, die diese stark typisierte Ressourcenklasse verwenden.

member.name: M:Pilz.Configuration.ConfigurationSerializer.WriteToString(Pilz.Configuration.SimpleConfiguration)
member.summary: Writes the given instance to a string and return it.
member.param: The configuration instance that should be serialized.
member.returns: The content of the configuration instance as string.

member.name: M:Pilz.Configuration.ConfigurationSerializer.WriteToStream(Pilz.Configuration.SimpleConfiguration,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Write the given instance to a given stream.
member.param: The configuration instance that should be serialized.
The stream where the content should be written to.

member.name: M:Pilz.Configuration.ConfigurationSerializer.WriteToFile(Pilz.Configuration.SimpleConfiguration,System.String)
member.summary: Writes the given instance to the given filePath as text file.
member.param: The configuration instance that should be serialized.
The file path where the content should be written to. The file will be created or overwritten.

member.name: M:Pilz.Configuration.ConfigurationSerializer.ReadFromString``1(System.String)
member.summary: Reads a configuratin from the given string and returns an instance of it.
member.typeparam: The type of the configuration class to instance.
member.param: The content of the configuration as string.

member.name: M:Pilz.Configuration.ConfigurationSerializer.ReadFromString(Pilz.Configuration.SimpleConfiguration,System.String)
member.summary: Read a configuration from the given string and put them to the given instance.
member.param: The instance to populate with the configuration.
The content of the configuration as string.
